0.text: Innate: Ezreal generates a stack of Rising Spell Force for each enemy hit by his abilities, which lasts 6 seconds, refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. Rising Spell Force: For each stack, Ezreal gains  10% bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 50%.
Active: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.

1.text: If Mystic Shot successfully hits an enemy, Ezreal's abilities' cooldowns are  reduced by 1.5 seconds (including Mystic Shot's).

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires an orb in the target direction that marks the first enemy  champion, epic  monster, or structure hit for 4 seconds.

1.text: His next basic attack or ability against the target detonates the mark, dealing them magic damage.

2.text: If the mark was detonated with an ability, Ezreal restores the  mana cost of that ability plus  60 mana.

0.text: Active: After the cast time, Ezreal  blinks from his current location up-to 475 units towards the target location, firing a homing bolt that deals magic damage to the nearest enemy and briefly  reveals them.

1.text: Arcane Shift prioritizes firing at the nearest enemy marked by  Essence Flux.

2.text: The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability. Arcane Shift will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires an energy projectile in the target direction, which briefly grants  sight of the area it flies through and deals magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Minions and non-epic  monsters take 50% reduced damage.
